name: Virgin Brazilian Loose Wave
description:
Hair Extension Type:Weaving
 Color:Black/dye the color as you like
  Material:Human Hair
 Net Weight:95g-105g
 Style:Wavy
 Human Hair Type:Brazilian Hair
 Length:12-26 inch available
 Hair Style:Body wave extension
 
What type of hair care products should I use?

A : Treat this hair just as if it was your own hair. Use good quality shampoo and conditioning products. Conditioning your hair is very important to keep it soft and manageable, so use leave in conditioners. You can also use products like gel and hair spray to keep the curls in place, but make sure to wash your hair and not leave in these products in for a long time.

Recommended shampoos and conditioners: Pantene PROV For treatment and every day use: Olive Oil Hair Polisher.

For a full sew in I recommend 3 bundles(4 oz per bundle)

Return Policy:All sales are FINAL!!!! There are no Refunds 

Orders are shipped as they are processed please allow 5-10 business days for your order to arrive before contacting me

Note: All orders placed on the weekend will not be processed until the next business day
